title: Axiom Governance Configuration Asset (AGCA) PCTM Metadata Schema

pctm_standard_id.description: The specific version of the PCTM standard applied.

policy_axiom_version.description: Semantic Attestation Layer (SAL) version of the embedded policy.

owner_agent.description: The governance agent responsible for authoring/approving the asset (e.g., GAX).

last_modified_utc.description: Timestamp of the last authorized modification (ISO 8601).

hash_sha256.description: SHA-256 hash of the 'configuration_data' object content.

gkm_signature.description: Cryptographic signature generated using an authorized GKM key.

configuration_data.description: The actual policy and configuration payload.
